title: Risk Management for Recreation, Parks and Tourism
description: Legislative and legal aspects of public, private, commercial, and non-profit recreation, parks, and tourism agencies. Emphasis on risk management, including liability, insurance, and negligence. Understanding of legal foundations and the legislative process. Field trips may be required. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: RPTA 210 or RPTA 260 with C- or better, junior standing
